Adlaw Resort

Adlaw Resort stands out from the rest, offering an unrivaled experience that will leave you in awe. Located between the forests and turquoise waters of Pangulasian Island, it is the ultimate luxurious escape from your busy life. Whether you prefer relaxation or engaging activities, we offer a wide range of options for an unforgettable stay.
